channel.title: How to rank yourself in your server 317
channel.description:
Difficulty: 0/10 Okay if anyone has a 317 server and is new to it and wanna know how to rank yourself here is how. 1.open your source folder 2.Double click the folder characters 3.Double click your character or whoever you would like to rank 4.Go to rights and type 1 for mod 2 for admin 3 for owner 4 for hidden admin and 10 for owner 5.After you rank the character w/e your want to rank it in the top left corner click file then save. 6.NOW YOUR ARE RANKED. :)
Here is what character rights for owner looks like- character-rights = 3

item.title: How to rank yourself in your server 317
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

I read a starter guide…one of the many moparscape has. But to answer your question, yes. I figured it out on my own. That’s not my point though. I have seen at least 6-7 of these basic tuts for changing your player rights. There are many of them already (not dissing his efforts though).

item.title: How to rank yourself in your server 317
item.dc:creator: @kc_titan_911 kc titan 911
item.description:
@kc_titan_911 wrote:

Difficulty: 0/10
Okay if anyone has a 317 server and is new to it and wanna know how to rank yourself here is how.
1.open your source folder
2.Double click the folder characters
3.Double click your character or whoever you would like to rank
4.Go to rights and type 1 for mod 2 for admin 3 for owner 4 for hidden admin and 10 for owner
5.After you rank the character w/e your want to rank it in the top left corner click file then save.
6.NOW YOUR ARE RANKED.

Here is what character rights for owner looks like-
character-rights = 3

Read full topic
